name: Beetylimpics
description:
Do you have what it takes to roll with the champions? Be prepared to back up your words as you back up your beetle in four intense sports: soccer, hockey, cricket, and bowling! Can you net a win, or will you just strike out?

This isn't your run-of-the-mill sports game, though. No lootboxes! No microtransactions! No hoping the luck of the draw gets you the player you need! It's just you and your opponent, one-on-one, in a competition for beetle supremacy!

So, if you think you're thick-shelled enough, then let the games begin!
